resources.string: Advance the mass transportation system to provide civilized, environmental and economic transportation that works with smart payment systems, fuel and clean energy sources, in order to provide more services, comfort and safety for the Egyptian citizen.

The English Company for Mass Transportation is an Egyptian joint stock company and is the largest A.R.M company for passenger transport in Egypt, representing more than 45% of the total transportation in Egypt and has the widest transportation network in Greater Cairo, which includes Cairo, Giza and Qalyubia, and also in Gharbia Governorate.
